episode: After getting married a few years ago, I remember feeling so trusting of my life partner. This trust is what makes my relationship work.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: After getting married a few years ago, I remember feeling so trusting of my life partner. This trust is what makes my relationship work.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's beautiful. Trust is the foundation of a strong relationship.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It took a lot of work though. I felt more trusting after getting married because of our honesty.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Honesty fosters deep trust, doesn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, definitely. We were both unfaithful in our relationship but we're past that now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Infidelity can be tough to overcome, but it sounds like you both worked through it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, our wedding vows to each other were focused on the importance of trust.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's lovely. You both made a conscious commitment to prioritize trust.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That trust gives us peace of mind to just focus on making each other happy.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a wonderful feeling to have that security and freedom to love each other fully.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A good marriage is hard work if we each aren't pulling our load.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Teamwork makes the dream work, especially in marriage.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's a great saying! I think I'm going to steal that hehe

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Feel free to! It's a saying that's meant to be shared.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you have any advice to give me regarding trust in my relationship

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Communicate openly & honestly, and never stop making time for each other.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is so true! We try to always be open with one another.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great to hear! Transparency is key to a healthy relationship.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It also doesn't hurt that we're both working professionals and we only have time for us outside of work.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Having shared priorities and dedicated time for each other is a great foundation.
